document.full_text: law enforcement officials in liberty county, texas, were hunting on wednesday for a tipster who claimed to have psychic knowledge of a mass grave containing up to 30 bodies in a rural area.
document.title: police hunt for texas tipster with story about bodies
lines_and_colors: law enforcement officials in liberty county, texas, were hunting on wednesday for a tipster who claimed to have psychic knowledge of a mass grave containing up to 30 bodies in a rural area.
